```{r}
# 利用Vector找出異常的BMI
height= c(180, 169, 173)
weight = c(73, 87, 43)
stu = c('Brian', 'Toby', 'Sherry')
BMI = weight/(height/100)^2
names(BMI) = stu
BMI[BMI<18.5|BMI>=24]
```

```{r}
# 課程作業(cdc.Rdata)
cdc$exerany = as.factor(cdc$exerany)
cdc$hlthplan = as.factor(cdc$hlthplan)
cdc$smoke100 = as.factor(cdc$smoke100)
# 1.資料中各健康狀況的分佈比例?
summary(cdc$genhlth)

# 2.男女生中有抽菸的比例?
cdc %>%
  group_by(gender) %>%
  summarise(smoke = sum(smoke100=='1')/sum(cdc$smoke100))
  
# 3. 繪製年紀的直方圖
library('ggplot2')
h = ggplot(cdc, aes(x=age))
h + geom_bar()

```
